name: DarkHospital
description:
Game name: DarkHospital

Genre: Horror Adventure

Release date: Scheduled for January

overview:

You are trapped in a certain abandoned hospital. A ferocious dragon is roaming around the hospital. You aim to escape from the hospital while facing the dragon.

The hospital used to be a hospital. However, due to an accident, the hospital was left in ruins. The inside of the hospital is dark and quiet. Then, out of nowhere, an eerie sound is heard.

You collect 10 books while exploring the dark hospital. By collecting books, the door will open and you can escape.

However, it is also important to be careful not to be seen by the dragon. When the dragon spots you, it will attack you mercilessly. If the player is spotted by a dragon, the game is immediately over.

Can you escape from the hospital safely?
